Description: For your consideration is a gently used Sweetwater Limited Edition USA Fender Sandblasted Stratocaster, fully upgraded, hot-rodded, and customized. I fell in love with the Fender Sandblasted guitars back in 2015 and love to mod them even more. Baby number 2 is on the way, so although it’s not a dire sale, the wife is kindly asking to thin the herd (just a little) in preparation. The guitar itself is in excellent to near mint condition. I only found one very faint surface scratch, which was hard to catch in most lights and angles, especially on this finish. It’s on the front, just above the pickguard, above the neck pickup. Although barely visible, just wanted to document the small blemish. Below is rundown of specs/upgrades on this particular guitar. Fender USA Sandblasted Stratocaster Sweetwater Exclusive Limited Run - 3 Tone Burst Pre-mod sale picture from Sweetwater available for comparison Purchased new American Special Maple Neck with more exotic grains to match body. Black hardware installed (Schaller Locking Tuners, Kluson string trees, GraphTech Tusq XL Nut, 2124 Customs Neck Plate) Vinyl decal on 1st fret easily able to be removed. Just for accent. Body professionally routed at Joes Music in Eastpointe, MI for a HSH configuration under pickguard along with space for battery. Black Hardware installed on body. Wilkinson/Gotoh Tremolo Bridge (with whammy bar). Dunlop dual design strap pins, Perle Guitars brushed black aluminum pickguard, volume knob and jack plate. Under the hood is a set of Railhammer Chisel Ceramic Pickups. (Passive) High quality, versatile, and extremely clear. The guitar is wired with just a 500k volume pot, 5 way switch and a TESI LED killswitch. The killswitch is a soft switch (does not lock) is great for Tremolo/Stutter type effects. Guitar setup in E Standard Tuning with 10-46 GHS boomer guitar strings. Fender Deluxe Gig Bag included *Free upgrade to Fender Hardshell Case if Full Buy it Now option chosen. Inquire for further details.* Everything shown in the pics is included in the sale. If you require any additional pictures or information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Technical Information: All sales are final and returns are not accepted. Payment is expected via PayPal within 24 hours of auction closing. FedEx Insured Ground Shipping is $59.00 to anywhere in the USA. International bidders are welcome through the Global Shipping Program. Please make sure your country is (1) eligible for shipment and (2) also be aware of duties, taxes, customs or additional charges associated with using the program. If there are any questions or concerns, please let me know. Thanks for looking and have a great weekend.
Title: Fender USA Limited Edition Sandblasted Stratocaster Guitar - Custom Upgrades
